    		College of Natural Sciences
    	The College of Natural Sciences (NSC) at Chico State has eight amazing departments with many majors to choose from. Our students gain hands-on experiences in state-of-the-art facilities.  Research projects, internships and field experiences offer students an opportunity to collaborate and prepare for future success.We offer seminars and colloquia series featuring speakers who are making breakthroughs at the leading edge of mathematical, scientific, and nursing research.  NSC is committed to your success. Graduates from all our programs find fulfilling and rewarding careers!Apply to Chico StateWith one of the highest 4-year graduation rates in the CSU system and lowest average student debt amounts in the country, Chico State offers one of the nation’s highest return on investment.Apply to Chico StateDepartments and Contact Information

    		                Science Building, Room 450530-898-6121nscstudentsuccess@csuchico.edu Gateway Science Museum Exhibit Takes Visitors On a Water Drop's Extreme JourneyCollege of Natural Sciences Dean Recognized with Environmental Lifetime Achievement AwardFive-Year, $430,000 Grant Funds Cutting Edge Physics Research at CSU, Chico“This new building was designed from day one to be a place that draws students to the sciences. It provides not just a place to come and take classes, but to stick around and develop a sense of community.  We want as many students as possible to see science as an exciting opportunity and as something that is available to them.”  - Dean David Hassenzahl, PhDBuilding Tour, September 2020Soft Opening, March 2021Dedication, October 2021InstagramListen to the experiences of your NSC faculty and students(opens in new window)New Science Building Tour(opens in new window) North State Public RadioBlue Dot #242: The James Webb Space Telescope(opens in new window)Blue Dot #239: New Science Building Promotes a Paradigm Shift(opens in new window)If you need special accommodation to access any document on this page, please contact the Office of Accessible Technology (OATS): Call OATS (530-898-6532) | Email OATS.College of Natural SciencesScience Building, Room 413 530-898-6121naturalsciences@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/nsciSupport our College(opens in new window)Program PortfolioDepartmentsBiological SciencesChemistry & BiochemistryEarth and Environmental SciencesMathematics & StatisticsNutrition & Food SciencesPhysicsSchool of NursingScience Education
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
